00016 template<class DATA, int DIMENSIONALITY, class PRECISION, class SOURCE>
00017 class SourceCombineOf 
00018         : public SourceOf<DATA, DIMENSIONALITY, PRECISION>
00019 {
00020         typedef VectorOf<SOURCE*> VECPSRC;
00021 protected:
00022         VECPSRC m_vecpsrc;
00023         mutable PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY, PRECISION> m_ptSize;

00026         SourceCombineOf()
00027                 : SourceOf<DATA, DIMENSIONALITY, PRECISION>()

00030         }

00032         SourceCombineOf(SourceCombineOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION,SOURCE>&src)
00033                 : SourceOf<DATA,DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION>(src)
00034                 , m_vecpsrc(src.m_vecpsrc)
00035         {
00036         }
00037 
00038         virtual ~SourceCombineOf()
00039         {
00040                 if (m_vecpsrc.AboutToDie()){
00041                         for (int n=0; n<m_vecpsrc.C(); n++){
00042                                 ReleasePointer(m_vecpsrc[n]);
00043                         }
00044                 }
00045         }
00046 
00047 public:
00048 
00049         SOURCE* PSource(int n)
00050         {
00051                 return m_vecpsrc[n];
00052         }
00053 
00054         const SOURCE* PSource(int n) const
00055         {
00056                 return m_vecpsrc[n];
00057         }
00058 
00059         SOURCE** VSources()
00060         {
00061                 return m_vecpsrc.V();
00062         }
00063 
00064         const SOURCE** VSources() const
00065         {
00066                 return m_vecpsrc.V();
00067         }
00068 
00069         virtual void AddSource(SOURCE* psource)
00070         {
00071                 ClaimPointer(psource);
00072                 m_vecpsrc.Append(psource);
00073         }
00074 
00075         const int& CSources() const
00076         {
00077                 return m_vecpsrc.C();
00078         }
00079 
00080         virtual String Describe() const
00081         {
00082                 return (
00083                         _LINE + "SourceCombineOf(" + DIMENSIONALITY + "D)" + LINE_ + 
00084                         this->DescribeCommon()
00085                 );
00086         }
00087 
00088         virtual String DescribeCommon() const
00089         {
00090                 String s;
00091                 for (int n=0; n<m_vecpsrc.C(); n++){
00092                         s = s + ( 
00093                                 _INDENT + (
00094                                         _LINE + "source: " + n + LINE_ +
00095                                         (_INDENT + this->m_vecpsrc[n]->Describe() + LINE_)
00096                                 )
00097                         );
00098                 }
00099 
00100                 return _INDENT + (
00101                         _LINE + "size: " + this->Size().Describe() + LINE_ + 
00102                         s
00103                 );
00104         }
00105 
00106         const PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION>& Size() const
00107         {
00108                 return m_ptSize;
00109         }
00110 
00111         virtual PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION> Bound(const PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION>& pt) const{
00112                 return pt.Bound(
00113                         PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,PRECISION> (PRECISION(0)),
00114                         this->Size()
00115                 );
00116         }
00117 
00118         virtual void PrepareForAccessAction() const
00119         {
00120                 m_ptSize=PSource(0)->Size();
00121         }
00122 
00123         virtual void PrepareForAccess() const
00124         {
00125                 // tell each source to prepare first
00126                 for (int n=0; n<m_vecpsrc.C(); n++){
00127                         m_vecpsrc[n]->PrepareForAccess();
00128                 }
00129 
00130                 // the call the specific Combine's AccessPreparation function
00131                 this->PrepareForAccessAction();
00132         }

00141         {}
00142

00147         void Serialize(Stream &st) const
00148         { 
00149                 SerializeSelf(st);
00150                 for (int n=0; n<m_vecpsrc.C(); n++){
00151 			::SerializePointer(st,this->m_vecpsrc[n]);
00152                 }
00153         }
00154 
00155         void Deserialize(Stream &st)
00156         {
00157                 DeserializeSelf(st);
00158                 for (int n=0; n<m_vecpsrc.C(); n++){
00159 			::DeserializePointer(st,this->m_vecpsrc[n]);
00160                 }
00161         }

00218         inline _class<_data,_dims,_precision,SOURCE> *                                                                                                                  \

00220         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00221                 typedef _class<_data,_dims,_precision,SOURCE> SRC_OUT;                                                                          \
